song.title: Give Us Clean Hands
song.lyrics:
[V] .G We bow our hearts .D/F# We bend our knees .C G Oh Spirit come make us humble || .G We turn our eyes .D/F# From evil things .C Oh Lord we cast down our idols
[C] . G Give us clean hands . D Give us pure hearts . Em D G Let us not lift our souls to another
[b] . G Oh God let us be . D A generation that seeks . Em D G Who seeks Your face, Oh God of Jacob
song.presentation: V C V C B C
